SNKRUP

Tools:

SNKRUP is a member's only paid subscription online store to resell premium exclusive sneakers. Member's receive access to purchase limited products and monthly giveaways. On top of the shopping experience, the site provides articles on the industry relative to the products it sells. I designed & developed the site, built on the Shopify platform.

Tools:

  • Shopify
  • Liquid
  • HTML/CSS
  • JQuery
ACD Gallery

Tools:

I designed and built a Shopify theme around the intimate and unique retail experience this international fashion & lifestyle boutique provides. Highlighting the products themselves above content & imagery creates a shopping experience to expand the store's goal of cultivating brands, artists & designers.

Tools:

  • Shopify
  • Liquid
  • HTML/CSS
  • JQuery
Khaore

Tools:

I developed a Shopify theme for the launch of Khaore's site and brand identity designed by Pentagram. "Art with utility" spans from the product line to the site to provide a cohesive shopping experience that showcases luxury handbags and other accessories produced in limited editions, never to be reproduced once sold out.

Tools:

  • Shopify
  • Liquid
  • HTML/CSS
  • JQuery
Gym Standard

Tools:

Working directly with the business owner, I built a responsive Shopify theme and set-up to enable his brick & mortar retail space to expand the store's reach to the web for the first time. The design remains simple, consistent with branding, and true to the purpose of showcasing carefully selected goods.

Tools:

  • Shopify
  • Liquid
  • HTML/CSS
  • JQuery
Little Wolf Coffee

Tools:

I worked alongside the PerkyBros design team to develop a Shopify store that was consistent with Little Wolf Coffee's new display and merchandising materials they had created, allowing user's to engage with the same experience of their cafe while expanding this small-batch roastery's reach with eCommmerce.

Tools:

  • Shopify
  • Liquid
  • HTML/CSS
  • JQuery

Green Bunnies Kitchen

Tools:

Green Bunnies is a food delivery app to browse, purchase, and schedule delivery of organic meals from the independent Green Bunnies kitchen. I developed and designed responsive web app alongside their existing iOS app in order to expand their reach and more easily incorporate new features to fit their growth.

Tools:

  • AngularJS
  • HTML/CSS
  • Kinvey
  • Spreedly
